articles.title: Ahmedabad plane crash live updates: 120 people feared dead after Air India crash; Rescue ops underway
articles.description: Ahmedabad plane crash live: An Air India flight carrying 242 passengers crashed near Ahmedabad Airport. As per sources, at least 120 people are feared dead. London-bound Flight AI 171 crashed moments after taking off from Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel International Airport.
articles.content: Ahmedabad plane crash live updates: At least 120 people are feared dead after an Air India flight carrying 242 passengers crashed near Ahmedabad Airport. The plane, en-route to London, crashed in a residential area, five minutes after taking off from... [618 chars]

articles.title: Third Filipino conjoined twins to undergo surgery in Saudi Arabia
articles.description: Klea Ann and Maurice Ann Misa of Lubang Island in Occidental Mindoro are set to become the third Filipino conjoined twins to undergo separation surgery in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
articles.content:

articles.title: PH experienced record-breaking temperatures, 'more than double the average' cyclones from Sept. to Nov. 2024: WMO report
articles.description: The Philippines certainly experienced extreme weather events — a result of human-induced climate change — throughout all of 2024, a report by the World Meteorological Organization revealed.
articles.content: A fishpond owner walks on a dried fishpond in Laur, Nueva Ecija on Saturday, April 27, 2024, as extreme heat brought about by El Niño caused some owners to stop operations. The Department of Agriculture earlier said that damage from El Niño has reach... [3742 chars]

articles.title: Pokémon TCG Sales, Warhammer 40K Humble Choice, and Samsung Smart Monitor Offers
articles.description: As of June 11, sealed Pokémon cards are on sale, Humble Choice includes Warhammer 40K Boltgun and Soul Reaver Remastered, and Samsung is offering $100 off plus up to $300 in credit on new Smart AI Monitors. Preorders and discounts live now.

articles.title: ‘We’ve been left in this mess’: residents of condemned Merseyside blocks face eviction
articles.description: Fire risk at neighbouring Kirkby buildings means 24-hour safety watch is only way to protect residents – but it may end any day
articles.content:

articles.title: London-bound Air India plane with 242 people onboard crashes after takeoff
articles.description: Officials say many feared dead after aircraft crashes into a doctors’ hostel in the city of Ahmedabad
articles.content:
Many people are feared to have been killed after a London-bound Air India flight with 242 people onboard crashed into a hostel for doctors in India’s north-western city of Ahmedabad, officials said.

articles.title: Mattel taps OpenAI to help it design toys, other products
articles.description: [LOS ANGELES] Mattel, the maker of Barbie dolls and Hot Wheels cars, has signed a deal with OpenAI to use its artificial intelligence tools to design and in some cases power toys and other products based on its brands.
